name: The Womb
description:
There is too much stress in your life.

Why not take a little time out to rest in the Womb?

WASD or Arrows to move.

E to start scanning

R to stop scanning

Left Mouse click to dig

by Outlands

http://outlands-games.com/

https://twitter.com/OutlandsGames

https://www.facebook.com/OutlandsGames

Music by Burai

https://soundcloud.com/burai
